 Promotion for buying Samsung Galaxy Note 3 &#12288; 1. Eligibility: &#12288; New postpaid subscribers or postpaid subscribers that are activating 2 ways communication and belong to: Postpaid subscribers are under-named by enterprise or organization Postpaid subscribers are under-named by Personal customer who is staff of Enterprise or Organization (Notes: MUST be confirmed by enterprise/ organization ). NOT applicable for Professional, assigned, tested subscribers, internal customer’s subscribers Center 2: beside above conditions, subscribers must have Billing Payment Address at Center 2 2. Content: &#12288; a. Eligibility and attached plans: Enterprise customer has more than 20 subscribers: no need to activate/register/apply plans when buying device Enterprise has subscribers that are activating 2 ways communication: must activate/register/apply DMIU (data plan) or DNSMS1 ( SMS plan) when buying device New postpaid : must activate/register/apply DNS1, DNS2, DNS3 (Voice and Data Plans) when buying device b. Benefits and comparison between Plans' benefits: Can buy Samsung Galaxy Note 3 with special price (public price is VND 1 6.990.000 ) and to whom are at Center 2 can use Citibank master card to pay by installments Can activate/ register/ apply plans with special benefits, for ex: DBMIU : VND 200.000 for 7 GB (normal plan has only 3,5GB ) DNSMS1: VND100.000 for 600 on-net sms (600 sms costs VND 1 74.000 )... Buy "plan for Voice call and Data" w ith a very special price (value is about VND 1.500.00 0 to VND 1.800.000 , but customer just pays only VND 294.000 or VND 394.000 or 500.000) => Depend on regulation of plan, subscriber must pay in advance all cost (plan's cost). This advance must be pay right after registering and will be deduct gradually on next months 3. Details: The run time of program of centers can be different The end time of promotion is on 10/31/2013 or out of device (whichever come first) Area Time Content Company (Preference) 1/10 - 31/10/2013 Chi tiết Center 1 Đang chờ triển khai Center 2 5/10 - 31/10/2013 Chi tiết Center 3 1/10 - 31/10/2013 Chi tiết Center 4 1/10 - 31/10/2013 Chi tiết Center 5 1/10 - 31/10/2013 Chi tiết Center 6 1/10 - 31/10/2013 Chi tiết &#12288; 4. Program at Center 2: &#12288; 4.1. Content : &#12288; a. Time : From 5/10/2013 to 31/10/2013 or s old out of device &#12288; b. Benefits : - Program 1: Buying Note 3 without plans &#12288; Enterprise/ Organization has more than 20 subscribers( activating 2 ways) and be named as Enterprise/Organization, not include subscribers that buy device with plan (With every 20 subscribers can buy 1 device) Price : VND 14.690.000đ - Program 2: Subscribers which are activating 2 ways communication, buy device with plans &#12288; Eligibility and plans : &#12288; Eligibility Subscribers are under-named by Enterprise Subscribers are under-named by Personal Customer and register MBusiness Be using BMIU Not using BMIU Be using BMIU Not using BMIU Price (VND) 14.690.000 14.690.000 The amount of advance payment (VND) 0 600.000 600.000 1.200.000 Plan DNSMS1 DBMIU DNSMS1 DBMIU DBMIU Number of cycles that customer must commit to use 6 cycles 3 cycles or 6 cycles 6 cycles 3 cycles 6 cycles Plan : &#12288; Name DBMIU DNSMS1 Plan cost ( NOT include monthly fee) VND 200.000/ 30 days VND 100.000/ 30 days Benefits 7GB / 30 days , after free data - the speed will be slow as BMIU's regulation (DL/UL = 128/64 kbps) 600 on-net sms / 30 days Number of cycles can get benefits 3 cycles or 6 cycles ( depend on the commitment of using of customer) - Program 3: New active postpaid buys device with plan &#12288; Eligibility and plans : &#12288; Eligibility 1. Normal Enterprise 2. VIP Enterprise , Strategic Enterprise Subscribers are under-named by Enterprise Subscribers are under-named by Personal Customer who is staff of Enterprise Subscribers are under-named by Enterprise Subscribers are under-named by Personal Customer who is staff of Enterprise Price (VND) 14.690.000 12 . 790 .000 14.690.000 12 . 790 .000 The amount of advance payment (VND) 0 1 . 764 .000 2 . 364 .000 0 0 6.000.000 Plan DNS2; DNS3 DNS2 DNS3 DNS1 DNS2; DNS3 DNS1 &#12288; Plans' benefits : &#12288; Name DNS1 DNS2 DNS3 Plan cost / cycle ( included monthly fee) - VND 500.000 294.000 394.000 Benefits Voice call - Free first 1 0 minutes , maximum 1.500 minutes / cycle - Thời gian hưởng KM: đến 31/10/2014 MobiFone. VinaPhone Fixed VNPT number (included Gphone) in all over the country. MobiFone. Fixed VNPT number (included Gphone) in all over the country. MobiFone. VinaPhone Fixed VNPT number (included Gphone) in all over the country. Data - Offer DBMIU plan 7GB/30 days , and using within 12 cycles After free data - the speed will be slow as BMIU's regulation (DL/UL = 128/64 kbps) Number of cycles commits to use 12 cycles 6 cycles 6 cycles c. Checking free allowance: Checking free minutes, sms : KT_KN send to 999 (200đ/sms) Checking free data: KT_data send to 999 (200đ/sms) 4.2. Regulations &#12288; a. General regulations: If customers are eligible for many programs, they are allowed to join each program for each different subscriber Applied for current rounding rule Applied for peak and off-peak hour All benefits are applied for 1 cycle only, the left minutes will be canceled (cannot cumulate for the next period). After minutes allowance, customer will be charged at current rate charges. Do not allow joining other promotions , unless document of those programs regulate IF customers cancel joining the promotion, they are not allowed to re-register b. Regulations of Data DBMIU: At the time register to join program, if customer are using other MI plans: MI plan will be canceled (customer must pay the plan cost) and be replaced by DBMIU To subscribers that register DBMIU plan only, since the 4th cycles, the system will send SMS to warn of out of data allowance in order to let customer choose between continue using plan or canceling plan After the commit-time: BMIU plan will be registered by default (3,5GB/ 30 days , cost VND 200.000) c. Regulations of commitment: C ommit using subscriber number with device . And during the commit time, customers do not allow to Switch to other subscriber types Cancel/Stop using postpaid. Transferring ownership. Temporary block 2 ways communications Stop joining this program. In case customers are compelled to do one in above situations, customer have to pay the joining fee as real-using day and return value of the device as a new one ( Reimburse d value = VND 16.900.000 - device's price that customer paid when joining program) When being blocked 1-2 ways communication , the plan STILL renew - NOT be canceled During the commit-time, customer can do one in above situations but not over 5% of total subscribers that join this program 4.3. Buy on installment plan with Citibank Visa Platinum Cashback at HCMC : &#12288; a. Regulation : Customers who use Citibank Visa Platinum Cashback can buy Note 3 on installment plan Enterprise Customer s already have Citibank card : installment in 3 months Enterprise Customers register new Citibank card : installment in 10 months Besides, customer can accumulate bonus points to convert into money (called cashback) as regulation of Citibank: limit accumulation is about 1% or maximum VND 600.000 b. Place can buy on installment plan ( There will have Citibank staff who will support customer at these places) CH 80 Nguyễn Du CH 123 Bà Huyện Thanh Quan. &#12290; 4.3. &#12507;&#12540;&#12481;&#12511;&#12531;&#24066;&#12395; Citibank &#12398;&#12459;&#12540;&#12489;&#12391;&#38651;&#35441;&#12434;&#36023;&#12387;&#12390;&#12289;&#12394;&#12375;&#12367;&#12378;&#12375;&#12391;&#36023;&#12358;&#65306; a. &#12523;&#12540;&#12523;&#65306; Citibank &#12398;&#12459;&#12540;&#12489;&#12434;&#21033;&#29992;&#12377;&#12428;&#12400;&#12289;&#38651;&#35441;&#12434;&#36023;&#12387;&#12390;&#12289;&#12394;&#12375;&#12367;&#12378;&#12375;&#12391;&#36023;&#12360;&#12427; Citibank &#12398;&#12459;&#12540;&#12489;&#12434;&#25345;&#12387;&#12383;&#20225;&#26989;&#65306; 3 &#12534;&#26376;&#20197;&#20869;&#12395;&#12394;&#12375;&#12367;&#12378;&#12375;&#12377;&#12427; Citibank &#12398;&#12459;&#12540;&#12489;&#12434;&#26032;&#30331;&#37682;&#12377;&#12427;&#65306; b. &#12394;&#12375;&#12367;&#12378;&#12375;&#12395;&#25903;&#25173;&#12358;&#12450;&#12489;&#12524;&#12473;&#65306; 80 Nguyễn Du &#36009;&#22770;&#24215; 123 Bà Huyện Thanh Quan&#36009;&#22770;&#24215; &#49549;&#54620;&#45796; . &#44592;&#50629;&#51060;&#45208; &#51312;&#51649; &#47749;&#51032;&#47196; &#49888;&#52397;&#54624; &#49888;&#44508; &#54980;&#48520;&#51228; &#44592;&#50629;&#51060;&#45208; &#47928;&#51088; (DNS1,DNS2,DNS3) &#50836;&#44552;&#51228;&#47484; &#45927;&#48537;&#51004;&#47732;&#49436; &#55092;&#45824;&#54256;&#51012; &#44396;&#51077;&#54616;&#44592; b. &#54812;&#53469;&#44284; &#45432;&#53944; 3 &#47484; &#44396;&#51077;&#54624; &#49688; &#51080;&#45796; . ( &#44277;&#49885; &#55092;&#45824;&#54256; &#44032;&#44201; : 16.990.000 &#46041; ). &#44536;&#47532;&#44256; &#49468;&#53552; 2 &#50640;&#49436; Citibank &#49888;&#50857;&#52852;&#46300;&#47484; &#51080;&#51004;&#47732; &#54624;&#48512;&#47196; &#44396;&#51077;&#54624; &#49688; &#51080;&#45796; . &#54812;&#53469; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228;&#47484; &#49888;&#52397;&#54624; &#49688; &#51080;&#45796; . &#50696;&#49884; : DBMIU &#50836;&#44552;&#51228; : 200.000 &#46041; , 7GB &#45936;&#51060;&#53552; &#51200;&#44277; ( &#51068;&#48152; &#45936;&#51060;&#53552; &#51228;&#44277; &#50857;&#47049;&#51008; 3,5G &#48150;&#50640; &#50630;&#51020; ) DNSMS1 &#50836;&#44552;&#51228; : 100.000 &#46041; , &#45236;&#48512; &#45348;&#53944;&#50892;&#53356; &#53685;&#49888;&#47581; &#49324;&#51060;&#50640; &#47928;&#51088; 600 &#44148; &#51080;&#51020; ( &#48372;&#53685; 600 &#47928;&#51088;&#45716; 174.000 &#47196; &#48512;&#44284;&#46112; &#44163;&#51060;&#45796; ) &#53685;&#54868;&#50752; &#47928;&#51088; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228;&#45716; &#47566;&#51060; &#54812;&#53469;&#51060; &#51080;&#45796; . ( &#53685;&#54868;&#50752; &#47928;&#51088;&#45716; 1.500.000 &#48512;&#53552; 1.800.000 &#46041;&#44620;&#51648; &#51068;&#48152; &#48512;&#44284;&#46112; &#44163;&#51064;&#45936; &#44256;&#44061;&#45784;&#51008; (200 &#46041; / &#44148; ) 4.2. &#51060;&#48292;&#53944;&#51032; &#44508;&#51221; : a. &#51068;&#48152; &#44508;&#51221; : &#50948; &#51060;&#48292;&#53944;&#51032; &#50668;&#47084;&#44032;&#51648; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228;&#47484; &#49688; &#51080;&#45796; . b. &#45936;&#51060;&#53552; DBMIU &#50640;&#45824;&#54620; &#44508;&#51221; : &#51060;&#48292;&#53944;&#50640; &#44032;&#51077;&#54616;&#44592; &#51473;&#50640; &#44256;&#44061;&#45784;&#51008; &#44592;&#53440; MI &#50836;&#44552;&#51228;&#47484; &#49324;&#50857;&#54616;&#44256; &#51080;&#51004;&#47732; &#54788; MI &#50836;&#44552;&#51228;&#45716; &#48148;&#47196; &#54644;&#52404;&#46104;&#47728; ( &#52572;&#44540; MI &#50836;&#44552;&#51228;&#51032; &#44592;&#48376;&#47308;&#47484; &#51648;&#48520;&#54644;&#50556; &#54620;&#45796; ) DBMIU &#47196; &#45824;&#52404;&#46112; &#44163;&#51060;&#45796; . DBMIU &#50836;&#44552;&#51228;&#47564; &#49888;&#52397;&#54624; &#44221;&#50864;&#50640; &#45348;&#48264;&#51704; &#51452;&#44592;&#48512;&#53552; ( &#45348;&#48264;&#51704; &#50672;&#51109;&#54616;&#44592; ) &#49884;&#49828;&#53596;&#51008; &#44592;&#54620;&#47564;&#47308;&#46112; &#50857;&#47049;&#50640; &#45824;&#54620; &#53685;&#48372;&#54644;&#46300;&#47532;&#44256; &#44256;&#44061;&#45784;&#51008; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228;&#47484; &#44228;&#49549; &#49324;&#50857;&#54616;&#44144;&#45208; &#47568;&#44144;&#45208; &#49440;&#53469;&#54624; &#49688; &#51080;&#45796; . &#49436;&#50669;&#49324;&#50857;&#44592;&#44036;&#51060; &#47564;&#47308;&#46112; &#46412; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228; BMIU &#47484; &#51088;&#46041; &#49888;&#52397;&#54624; &#44163;&#51060;&#45796; (3,5 GB/30 &#51068; , &#44592;&#48376;&#47308; : 200,000 &#46041; ) c. &#49436;&#50557;&#44508;&#51221; : &#55092;&#45824;&#54256;&#44284; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228; &#49324;&#50857;&#54624; &#44163;&#51012; &#49436;&#50557;&#54644;&#50556; &#54616;&#44256; 12 &#51452;&#44592;&#50640; &#51060;&#50857;&#54644;&#50556; &#54620;&#45796;&#44256; &#49436;&#50557;&#54644;&#50556; &#54620;&#45796; . &#51060; &#48292;&#53944; &#44592;&#44036;&#46041;&#50504; &#45796;&#51020;&#44284; &#44057;&#51008; &#49892;&#54665;&#54616;&#47732; &#50504; &#46108;&#45796; . &#49440; / &#54980;&#48520; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228;&#47196; &#51204;&#54872; &#54980;&#48520; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228; &#49325;&#51228; &#44228;&#50557;&#51088; &#48320;&#44221; &#48156;&#49888;&#44284; &#49688;&#49888; &#52264;&#45800; &#48156;&#49888;&#44284; &#49688;&#49888; &#51076;&#49884; &#52264;&#45800; &#51060;&#48292;&#53944;&#50640; &#52280;&#44032; &#44144;&#51208; / &#52712;&#49548; &#48520;&#44032;&#54637;&#47141;&#51064; &#51060;&#50976;&#47196; &#51060;&#48292;&#53944;&#50640; &#44032;&#51077;&#54624; &#44163;&#51012; &#52712;&#49548;&#54644;&#50556; &#54616;&#47732; &#44508;&#51221;&#50640; &#46384;&#46972;&#49436; &#51204;&#54868;&#50836;&#44552;&#51012; &#52649;&#48516;&#55176; &#44208;&#51228;&#54644;&#50556; &#54620;&#45796; . &#55092;&#45824;&#54256;&#51032; &#44050;&#44284; &#44228;&#50557;&#50640; &#46384;&#46972;&#49436; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228;&#47484; &#51060;&#50857;&#54616;&#45716; &#48708;&#50857;&#51012; &#54252;&#54632;&#54620;&#45796; . ( &#55092;&#45824;&#54256; &#54872;&#44553;&#44552;&#50529; = 16.900.000 &#46041; - &#51060;&#48292;&#53944;&#50640; &#44032;&#51077;&#54644;&#49436; &#55092;&#45824;&#54256;&#51012; &#50864;&#45824; &#44396;&#51077;&#54624; &#44032;&#44201; ) &#48156;&#49888;&#51060;&#45208; &#48156;&#49888;&#44284; &#49688;&#49888;&#51012; &#52264;&#45800;&#46112; &#44221;&#50864;&#50640; &#50836;&#44552;&#51116;&#45716; &#51088;&#46041; &#50672;&#51109;&#46104;&#47728; &#54644;&#52404;&#46104;&#51648; &#50506;&#45796; . &#50948;&#50640; &#44057;&#51008; &#51060;&#50976;&#47196; &#52712;&#49548;&#54624; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228; &#49688;&#47049;&#51060; &#51060;&#48264; &#51060;&#48292;&#53944;&#50640; &#52280;&#44032;&#54620; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228; &#49688;&#47049;&#51032; 5% &#47484; &#52488;&#44284;&#54616;&#47732; &#50504; &#46108;&#45796; . 4.3. &#54840;&#52236;&#48124;&#49884;&#50640;&#49436; Citibank &#49888;&#50857;&#52852;&#46300;&#47196; &#44208;&#51228;&#46112; &#54624;&#48512;&#47196; &#44396;&#51077; a. &#44508;&#51221; : Citibank &#49888;&#50857;&#52852;&#46300;&#47196; &#44208;&#51228;&#46104;&#47732; &#55092;&#45824;&#54256;&#51012; &#54624;&#48512;&#47196; &#44396;&#51077;&#54624; &#49688; &#51080;&#45796; . Citibank &#49888;&#50857;&#52852;&#46300;&#47484; &#51080;&#45716; &#44592;&#50629; : 3 &#44060;&#50900; &#45236;&#50640; &#54624;&#48512;&#47196; &#54620;&#45796; . &#49352;&#47196;&#50868; Citibank &#49888;&#50857;&#52852;&#46300;&#47484; &#49888;&#52397;&#54624; &#44592;&#50629; : 10 &#44060;&#50900; &#45236;&#50640; &#54624;&#48512;&#47196; &#54620;&#45796; . &#44536; &#50808;&#50640; Citibank &#51008;&#54665;&#51032; &#44508;&#51221;&#50640; &#46384;&#46972;&#49436; &#54788;&#44552;&#51004;&#47196; &#51204;&#54872;&#54624; &#49688; &#51080;&#45716; &#48372;&#45320;&#49828; &#51216;&#49688; &#51201;&#47549; (Cashback &#51060;&#46972;&#44256; &#48512;&#47480;&#45796; ): &#51201;&#47549;&#54620;&#46020;&#45716; 1% &#51060;&#45208; &#52572;&#45824; 600.000 &#46041;&#51064;&#45796; . b. &#54624;&#48512;&#47196; &#44396;&#51077;&#54624; &#49688; &#51080;&#45716; &#51452;&#49548; : ( Citibank &#51008;&#54665;&#51008; &#45796;&#51020;&#44284; &#44057;&#51008; &#51452;&#49548;&#50640; &#48372;&#51312; &#49345;&#45812;&#50896;&#51060; &#51080;&#45796; ) 80 Nguyễn Du &#51648;&#51216; 123 Bà Huyện Thanh Quan &#51648;&#51216; 909 Trần Hưng Đạo &#51648;&#51216; 431 Lê Hồng Phong &#51648;&#51216; 127C Đinh Tiên Hoàng &#51648;&#51216; 148 Trường Chinh &#51648;&#51216; &#6016;&#6040;&#6098;&#6040;&#6044;&#6071;&#6034;&#6072;&#6043;&#6016;&#6091;&#6033;&#6076;&#6042;&#6047;&#6096;&#6038;&#6098;&#6033; Samsung Galaxy Note3​ &#6047;&#6086;&#6042;&#6070;&#6036;&#6091;&#6050;&#6031;&#6071;&#6032;&#6071;&#6023;&#6035;&#6047;&#6048;&#6018;&#6098;&#6042;&#6070;&#6047; 7GB /30 &#6032;&#6098;&#6020;&#6083;,&#6016;&#6098;&#6042;&#6085;&#6016;&#6025;&#6098;&#6021;&#6036;&#6091;&#6036;&#6035;&#6098;&#6032;&#6041;&#6043;&#6098;&#6036;&#6079;&#6035;&#6031;&#6070;&#6040;&#6016;&#6086;&#6030;&#6031;&#6091; ​ BMIU (DL/UL = 128/64 kbps) 600 &#6047;&#6070;&#6042; &#6016;&#6098;&#6035;&#6075;&#6020;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6038;&#6096;&#6035;&#6098;&#6034;/ 30 &#6032;&#6098;&#6020;&#6083; &#6044;&#6018;&#6098;&#6018;&#6033;&#6033;&#6077;&#6043;&#6032;&#6082;&#6040;&#6023;&#6076;&#6035; &#6038;&#6081;&#6043;&#6043;&#6081;&#6017;&#6031;&#6098;&#6042;&#6076;&#6044;&#6036;&#6020;&#6098;&#6017;&#6070;&#6086;&#6020;1&#6017;&#6070;&#6020;,2&#6017;&#6070;&#6020; &#6036;&#6030;&#6098;&#6031;&#6070;&#6016;&#6025;&#6098;&#6021;&#6036;&#6091; Citibank &#6035;&#6085;Tp.HCM&#6102; a. &#6016;&#6070;&#6042;&#6016;&#6086;&#6030;&#6031;&#6091;&#6102; &#6050;&#6031;&#6071;&#6032;&#6071;&#6023;&#6035;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6016;&#6070;&#6031;&#6053;&#6030;&#6033;&#6070;&#6035;Citibank &#6050;&#6070;&#6021;&#6033;&#6071;&#6025;&#6033;&#6076;&#6042;&#6047;&#6096;&#6038;&#6098;&#6033;&#6042;&#6070;&#6036;&#6091;&#6102; 3&#6017;&#6082; &#6050;&#6031;&#6071;&#6032;&#6071;&#6023;&#6035;&#6047;&#6048;&#6018;&#6098;&#6042;&#6070;&#6047;&#6021;&#6075;&#6087;&#6024;&#6098;&#6040;&#6084;&#6087;&#6034;&#6098;&#6044;&#6078;&#6016;&#6070;&#6031;&#6053;&#6030;&#6033;&#6070;&#6035;(Citibank)&#6032;&#6098;&#6040;&#6072;&#6102; cashback) &#6031;&#6070;&#6040;&#6016;&#6070;&#6042;&#6016;&#6086;&#6030;&#6031;&#6091;&#6026;&#6084;&#6041;&#6049;&#6082;&#6016;&#6042;&#6036;&#6047;&#6091;&#6034;&#6035;&#6070;&#6018;&#6070;&#6042;Citibank: &#6016;&#6086;&#6042;&#6071;&#6031;&#6047;&#6035;&#6098;&#6047;&#6086;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6048;&#6082;&#6043; 1%&#6060;&#6021;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6035;&#6036;&#6086;&#6037;&#6075;&#6031;600.000đ b. &#6050;&#6070;&#6047;&#6096;&#6041;&#6026;&#6098;&#6027;&#6070;&#6035;&#6033;&#6071;&#6025;&#6042;&#6070;&#6036;&#6091; CH 80 Nguyễn Du CH 123 Bà Huyện Thanh Quan.
